title: Temporarily redirect BCH/flexUSD rewards to BCH/bcBCH and BCH/bcUSDT pairs
content: Reason is to source emergency liquidity for bridge alternative to CoinFLEX, due to the present problems regarding the uncertain situation with CoinFLEX. BCH/flexUSD rewards to be split equally between BCH/bcBCH and BCH/bcUSDT pools. This will go into effect immediately (pending timelock delay).
